hero.title: Build 2D games with speed and clarity
hero.subtitle: A developer-friendly TypeScript engine with a visual editor, multiplayer networking, and clean APIs. From your first sprite to production-ready games — Nostalgi2D makes game development accessible and enjoyable.

features.title: Visual Editor
features.description: Design meshes, configure scenes, and build plugins with a powerful in-browser editor. No command-line required to get started.

features.title: TypeScript-First
features.description: Full type safety from game logic to networking. Write code with confidence using modern TypeScript features and comprehensive APIs.

features.title: Multiplayer Ready
features.description: Built-in authoritative server with input-based replication, client prediction, and state reconciliation. Network your game from day one.

pitch.title: Why Developers Love Nostalgi2D
columns: Visual mesh designer and component editor — create assets without touching code.
Plugin system for extending the editor with custom panels and tools.
Hot reload during development for rapid iteration and testing.
Comprehensive tutorials covering both editor workflows and coding patterns.
Well-documented actor synchronization protocol with examples.
Step-by-step guides from Hello World to multiplayer games.
Clean, modular architecture with pluggable rendering backends (Pixi/Canvas/Three).
Entity Component System that's optional — use it when it fits your needs.
Headless server support for testing, bots, and automated validation.
